laboratory_examinations.findings: Initially normal, with an increase observed before the fourth IVGC infusion: ALT 79 U/L, GGT 227 U/L, ALP 207 U/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Normal liver function was restored after discontinuation of simvastatin and IVGC for 2 weeks: ALT 20 U/L, AST 15 U/L, GGT 34 U/L, ALP 43 U/L.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Baseline liver function normal, with a slight increase of ALT to 41 U/L after the fifth IVGC cycle (cumulative MP dose 2.5 g). Further increase was observed: ALT 133 U/L and AST 64 U/L.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: Three weeks post-IVGC discontinuation, further increase in serum AST and ALT was noted, followed by spontaneous progressive normalization of liver function.
